item.description:
WGBH radio host Brian O'Donovan co- hosts

 If you have a life, you have a story. Bring it.

Kennedy’s Midtown, 42 Province St. Boston, MA. www.kennedysmistown.com Tel 617-426-3333.
Contact massmouth tel# - 617.460.3544
email: norah@massmouth.com or andrea@massmouth.com

After sold out, SRO opening season massmouth‘s series continues this year with 6 slams at Kennedy’s Midtown, 42 Province Street, a short walk from Park Street T stop. Seating starts at 6:30pm. Stories begin at 7pm. If you have a five minute story on the theme bring it and drop your name in the box. Ten lucky tellers will be drawn at random to tell and be judged. Other audience members can join in on judging teams or just listen and enjoy a night of stories. Like poetry slams there are volunteer judges and massmouth awards  prizes to the top two stories. Listeners will be engaged in story improv games between each 5 minute feature.

WGBH radio host Brian O'Donovan co- hosts along side one of the massmouth storytellers. $7 general and $3 for students

massmouth and Kennedy’s offer a $50 gift certificate and a t-shirt for the winner of each monthly slam. On April 26, 2011 all the finalists will gather for a BIGMOUTHOFF story slam at Rabb Hall at Copley Square Library. massmouth will award the winners of this contest a fabulous prizes.

massmouth‘s slam series continues this year with slams in JP, Somerville and Cambridge. Doors open at 6:00pm and stories begin at 6:30PM pm. Ten lucky tellers will be drawn at random to tell and be judged and win a chance to advance to the finals.

Semi-Finals at Coolidge Corner Theater on APRIL 15th 2011

On April 26, 2011 all the finalists will gather for a BIGMOUTHOFF story slam at Rabb Hall at Copley Square Library.

Also check out our high school story slam project culminating on

April 30th, 2011 at the Cambridge Public Library.

massmouth story slams  2010-2011 

SUN     FEB 20     Bella Luna in JP  “beasts”

THURS FEB 24    Haley House Café, "POV" point of view

SUN     MAR 13    Enormous Room Cambridge "death and taxes"

SUN    MAR 20     Bella Luna in JP  “down and out”

MON    MAR 21      Kennedy's Midtown  Brian O'Donovan  "where I'm from"

THURS MAR 24    Haley House Café, "wysiwyg" adventures+ misses with computers

Want some help getting ready for the next story slams?

http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/free-story-coaching-by-phone

Cambridge Slams are co-sponsored with StoryStream, Cambridge

http://storystreamcambridge.blogspot.com/2010/08/storystream-at-river-festival-june-2010.html

 

"Because have a life, you  have a story. Bring it!

" http://massmouth.ning.com/forum/topics/story-slam-rules-pr-what-is

 

APR 26 TUES - Big Mouth Off at Copley BPL Rabb Hall
item.why: Last slam of the season at Kennedy's!

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group
